title: When removed from the wireless charger, Pixel 4 XL battery jumps by 4 to 5 percent
content:
When removed from the wireless charger, the cell phone battery jumps by 4 to 5 percent, only when the battery is above 80.It's been like this for months.The phone has been updated to the May security patch.
I also have a pixel 3ï¼Œit is normal.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
